<video width="600" height="400" controls>
  <source src="../User/Stimuli/cam/cam_social_2.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

You will see two boxes with locks
One box has videos of people while other has videos of household objects

Open the locks to see a video
You can choose freely which locks to open

Press the Z key once for each lock on the left box to unlock it

Press the M key once for each lock on the right box to unlock it

Wait until a lock has disappeared before you try to open another lock

You cannot change your mind about which video you want to choose once you've opened a lock

You've completed this part of the study!

You will receive a debrief of this study in an email.

Please proceed and DO NOT CLOSE THE WINDOW until you are told that the data has been succesfully sent.
